desc: Are you ready for the latest process integration solution from SAP? Meet SAP Process Orchestration! This is your complete guide to the tools and components of SAP PO. Learn how to build and configure interfaces and use SAP BPM to manage your business processes. Thanks to both a practical and comprehensive approach, youâ€™ll find out how to configure the System Landscape Directory, create an iFlow, monitor message processing, create BPM processes, and so much more.

details.authors: John Mutumba Bilay, Roberto Viana Blanco

title: SAP Process Orchestration: The Comprehensive Guide (First Edition) (SAP PRESS)
